title: Number of cars on the road in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2000 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of cars in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 19.
In general Number of cars in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of cars in millions is slightly increasing from 2000 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2012, roughly decreasing from 2012 to 2013, and finally slightly increasing from 2013 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2001 and 2002.
The highest Number of cars in millions, of value 32.5 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Number of cars in millions about 27.2 was reached at Year 2000
